name: iphone 6S
description: Apple iPhone 6s smartphone was launched in September 2015. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750 pixels by 1334 pixels at a PPI of 326 pixels per inch.

name: Samsung Glaxy S7
description: 13MP primary camera with auto mode, beauty face, continuous shot, interval shot, panorama mode and 5MP front facing camera with palm gesture selfie and 120 degree selfie mode

name: Redmi Note4
description: Redmi Note 4 smartphone was launched in August 2016. The phone comes with a 5.50-inch display with a resolution of 1080 pixels by 1920 pixels at a PPI of 401 pixels per inch. Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 price in India starts from Rs. 9,999.

name: PUMA
description: PUMA presents these navy blue coloured training shoes for men that are designed to deliver both speed and stability. It is made of mesh material and has rubber sole adds to their durability and provides a firm grip to your feet. Features closed toe style and lace up closure is a perfect piece to be worn on any athletic events.
